data.event: It was here that the Treaty of Greenville was signed on August 3, 1795, bringing peace to the area and opening up the Northwest Territory for settlement.

Local airports: Darke County Airport, seven miles away in Versailles, Ohio James M. Cox Dayton International Airport 35 miles away in Vandalia, Ohio Greenville is home to The Great Darke County Fair which runs for nine days in August.
